creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
description: Soft colored abstract with colors green, yellow, pink, blue and brown; gold frame with green wash on bevel; linen wrapped double mat
marks: Gallery label, verso. Initialed and dated in pencil, LR: [SD 14]
provenance: (Dayton's Gallery 12, Minneapolis, sold to Dayton, c. 1965-70; Mary Haldeman Dayton, Long Lake, Minn. (until d. 2010); estate of Mary Haldeman Dayton (2010; given to MIA)
title: Untitled
